thread.title: Rice, UNLV tip off Mountain West basketball media days
thread.title_full: Rice, UNLV tip off Mountain West basketball media days | Las Vegas Review-Journal

author: Chris Kudialis
title: Rice, UNLV tip off Mountain West basketball media days
text:
The Mountain West conference basketball media day starts Tuesday morning with players and coaches from five teams, including UNLV, scheduled to speak.
Head coach Dave Rice will represent the Rebels, along with senior guard Jerome Seagears and sophomore guard Patrick McCaw.
Fresno State, New Mexico, San Jose State and Utah State also are taking part in the event at the Renaissance Las Vegas Hotel.
Check out today's live blog below.
